channel.title: Physician Immunity BUG
channel.description:
**What happened?**
Drunk (11) debauched me but I(Physician - 7) was immune and was not affected
**What was SUPPOSED to happen?**
Physician are not target-immune therefore, i was supposed to heal 11 instead
**Steps to reproduce:**
1) start as physician 2) heal random first night 3) heal someone whos bleeding (11 i believe) 4) rez 16(psychic) 5) heal somone else whos bleeding (10) 6) heal 3(prince) 7) following message is : You will heal Edgeyworth [3] tonight. Someone tried changing your target, but you are immune. Edgeyworth [3] did not require healing
**Comments:** There were no CWs in my game i believe, and neither was I debauched or occed before.
https://ibb.co/jTUQQH

item.title: Physician Immunity BUG
item.dc:creator: prince2g
item.description:
Nope i was never target changed or occupied once until then

item.title: Physician Immunity BUG
item.dc:creator: prince2g
item.description:
Yea but it didnt appear randomly because the Drunk could not actually debauch me . I was actually immune.

Read full topic

item.title: Physician Immunity BUG
item.dc:creator: Navi
item.description:
I’m not sure about this, but I think the “Someone tried changing your target, but you are immune.” message is bugged at the moment. It seems to appear at random regardless of what actually happens at night.

I’ve received the message before as a king when I was guarding myself, which should be impossible because no target changers can target the king and I was not visiting someone else.

Read full topic

item.title: Physician Immunity BUG
item.dc:creator: prince2g
item.description:
What happened?

Drunk (11) debauched me but I(Physician - 7) was immune and was not affected

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

Physician are not target-immune therefore, i was supposed to heal 11 instead

Steps to reproduce:

  1. start as physician
  2. heal random first night
  3. heal someone whos bleeding (11 i believe)
  4. rez 16(psychic)
  5. heal somone else whos bleeding (10)
  6. heal 3(prince)
  7. following message is :
    You will heal Edgeyworth [3] tonight.
    Someone tried changing your target, but you are immune.
    Edgeyworth [3] did not require healing

Comments:
There were no CWs in my game i believe, and neither was I debauched or occed before.

https://ibb.co/jTUQQH
